Public Remarks: Central Richmond District Location! This home is close to vibrant culture of Geary Blvd, the historic charm of Presidio. renowned restaurants and the picturesque landscape of Lands End and Ocean Beach. Recently updated with refinished hardwood floors, new paint, new lighting fixtures. A remodeled kitchen and bathroom this home has so much to offer! The floorplan is flexible with endless possibilities. Don't miss it!
Showing Instruction: Go Directly,Lockbox - Supra iBox Bluetooth LE

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome home to 518 22nd Avenue! This charming, bright Central Richmond home enjoys the rare combination of intact period details and recently updated kitchen and baths. A majestic Redwood tree in the garden provides lovely vistas from all east facing rooms as well as privacy. On the main level, a stately fireplace is the focal point of the sunny living room which also includes glass-front bookcases. The spacious dining room with built-in hutch opens onto the stunning kitchen with new quartz counters and stainless steel appliances. A cozy sunroom or office and half-bath sit tucked just off the kitchen. The unusually deep and level garden has ample room for a play structure or outdoor kitchen. On the top floor are three sun-filled bedrooms, an office or nursery, and a refreshed bath. The garage has plenty of storage, laundry, and a large window for natural light. The home was recently painted inside and out and the original hardwood floors meticulously refinished. Enjoy nature nearby in Golden Gate Park, Ocean Beach or Land's End. Walk to shopping and dining as well as easy Muni access. Move right in! Won't last!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: A home that revolves around light and warmth, this 3 bedroom, 1 (split) bathroom urban oasis spans over 1600 square feet and is connected by generous sunlit spaces that afford abundant, unaffected serenity. Nestled within the heart of the sought-after Richmond District, its simplicity belies restraint with a carefully selected palette of materials and finishes ranging from beautiful original hardwood floors to a brick fireplace and finely-crafted custom built-ins to elegant windows that usher radiance in. Balancing both intimacy and openness, this abode is equally well-suited for individual repose and communal gathering while also placing you less than three blocks from renowned Golden Gate Park and under 15 minutes from downtown San Francisco. For added convenience, the lower level provides ample room for parking,storage and potential.
Confidential Remarks: CANCELED BROKERS TOUR! Several preemptive offers have been submitted and presented to the seller.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This thoroughly renovated 3 story home marries classic elegance with a completely modernized floor plan boasting captivating spaces throughout. The expansive main floor features an alluring living room with fireplace that adjoins an open dining room & kitchen + sunny alcove that's a cozy sitting nook &/or convenient office. French doors reveal an inviting deck for al fresco dining. A chef's kitchen has Sub Zero refrigerator & Wolf range, beautiful counters & backsplash & custom cabinetry providing superabundant storage. The sublime primary suite features a tailor-made dressing room with specialized storage solutions & graceful en-suite bath plus a private sitting area. Three of the 5 bright bedrooms share the top floor with 2 stylish full baths. A large 5th bedroom has a fireplace & can be a great 2nd living room for movie & popcorn nights or a splendid home office. Handsome wood floors, graceful moldings, striking fixtures & an abundance of lovely windows illuminate this exceptional home. A deep backyard has plenty space for outdoor fun & the huge garage has room for 2 cars (maybe 3 based on size) & copious storage. Enveloped in green spaces near The Presidio, Mountain Lake, great cafes, restaurants & shopping. Easy GG bridge access too. A must see dreamy house & location!
Confidential Remarks: Call to arrange a private showing. The garage will most likely fit 3 cars but buyers should check to be sure based on size/measurements. https://www.267-14thave.com/

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Just completed, in a coveted North of Lake Street cul-de-sac address, this custom-built home is the pinnacle of modern San Francisco luxury. 4 levels of thoughtfully planned and meticulously upgraded living space are adorned with innovative designer finishes imported from around the world. Four interior entertaining spaces include a formal living room with linear fireplace, open-plan great room, media room with dual wine cellar, and skylit family room. Four exterior spaces await through rolling glass walls and French doors. Enjoy indoor-outdoor living on multiple terraces, a sunlit patio, lush west-facing garden, and a view deck looking over the adjacent Presidio to the Marin Headlands. 5 spacious bedrooms, including 3 on one level, culminate in a voluminous primary suite with walk-in closet and luxurious bath. 2 well-placed powder rooms supplement 5 full baths - all with designer tile and fixtures. Designed for today, this stately smart home offers the latest in lifestyle technology. And multi-zone radiant heat under Spanish white oak flooring ensures individualized comfort in every space, including each bedroom. Planned with the future in mind with seismic updates and a design that accommodates the addition of an elevator. Welcome to 25 17th Avenue!
Confidential Remarks: Showing by appointment. For more information contact Mark Brown 415-359-5576 or mark@brownsf.com

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Tracy Tilin McKendell - Agt: 510-823-6744 - In the same family for over 50 years, legend has that this sweet modified shotgun-cottage hybrid was originally built by the neighboring owner for his daughter. At some point in its life before the current ownership, what seems to have been originally a 1/1 was added onto with a lovely large back bedroom with french doors open to the back yard, and a very generous primary suite including a dressing area large enough to be another room.  Shiny hardwoods and plantation shutters are downstairs. Many windows look into the Presidio from the primary bedroom upstairs. Kitchen and bathrooms smartly remodeled 20+ years ago. Generous closets throughout. Tandem garage with ceiling not quite legal living space height can easily hold two cars and has plenty of storage. Location on the coveted North of Lake cul-de-sac affords quiet privacy while being close to all retail and restaurants that the Central Richmond affords, including quiet street on Lake.
Confidential Remarks: MLS listing for comparable purposes only. Property was unexpectedly sold (COE 12/15/23) off-market to a private referral, below market value. Please contact listing agent for more information.  Note that insurance carrier required smart water shut-off valve to be installed during escrow and before binder was issued.
Directions to Property: Lake St to cul de sac

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Well-built 1920's cosmetic fixer in one the most desirable areas of San Francisco near Golden Gate Park, Geary Street shopping and transportation, and Argonne Elementary School. The open living/dining room design highlights a wood burning fireplace and bay windows that stretch across the full width of the home. The bright eat-in kitchen has a large pantry room and side stairs that lead to the garage. The property offers 2 bedrooms, one- and one-half bathrooms, sunroom, and a great deck to enjoy the northeastern greenbelt and sky views! The garage accommodates two vehicles with ample storage, separate side entrance and high ceiling presenting potential to add square footage. Huge backyard! Approx 3000 sq. ft. lot!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Modern two-level residence with a large, private backyard. This sophisticated condo features an open floor plan leading directly to the beautifully landscaped garden, ideal for entertaining! The updated kitchen features Calcutta Royal Marble flooring, frosted glass wood cabinets, soft touch drawers, stainless steel Viking appliances and a retro Whirlpool refrigerator. Completing the main level is a primary suite with Honey Onyx stone, a spa-like bath and walk-in closet with radiant heat throughout. At the rear you will find a large family room with an adjoining bedroom and luxurious bathroom with White Onyx from floor to ceiling. The upper level includes a bright and airy office, a spacious third bedroom, and direct access to the garage. This quiet urban oasis is private and lives like a single family home. Located in the heart of the Richmond District, it is a walker's paradise close to local eateries, markets and public transit. Easy access to Golden Gate Park, Baker Beach, Presidio and Lands End.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This spacious corner unit boasts two bedrooms, two full bathrooms, and overlooks a beautiful landscaped backyard. Impeccably renovated as part of a four-unit TIC building at 591-597 20th Ave, it's nestled in the highly sought-after central Richmond district. Bathed in natural light, the top floor features an inviting open-concept kitchen with stainless appliances and custom cabinets. Two generously sized bedrooms each come with en-suite bathrooms, one of which offers guest access. The large great room seamlessly combines with a dining area. drawing inspiration from lineage kitchen cabinet designs. Convenience is key with an in-unit washer and dryer, and forced air furnace. The unit is enhanced with beautiful hardwood flooring, double-pane windows, and updated electrical and plumbing systems. Plus, it includes a spacious independent one-car garage with ample storage. Affordable $350 monthly HOA fee covers water, common area cleaning and PG&E, insurance, and reserves. Nearby amenities abound, with a bus stop just a short block away and Geary Blvd. and Clement Street both within a few blocks reach. For nature lovers, GG Park is a 2 blocks south providing endless entertainment and leisure opportunities right at your doorstep.
Confidential Remarks: Owner is the Broker at Focus Realty. Listing agent is also related to the owner.
Directions to Property: Building is located in the highly desirable Centra

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Radiating everything that is wonderful about living in San Francisco, this Central Richmond home offers charm and space - and quite possibly the most magical garden in the City. Ideally located between beloved Golden Gate Park and an array of dining and retail options along popular Clement Street and Geary Boulevard, this 2,080 square foot home is spread out over three levels with a fantastic and flexible floor plan. Be greeted at the main entrance by a welcoming foyer, which leads both into the formal living room and a super sweet eat-in kitchen with a convenient half bath. A spacious dining room, complete with box beam ceilings and lovely period details, lies adjacent to the kitchen with a walk-out deck leading to the large west-facing garden with expansive outlooks. Three spacious bedrooms and a generous full bath are found upstairs. Another bedroom, living space, full bath and kitchenette are found on the lower level with direct garden access and separate entrance, perfect for guests. But let's talk about the garden! Get lost in your own backyard as you meander on the path beyond the arched trellis amongst the flowers and trees, leaving the big city behind. Other treasures include newer floors and windows, a one-car garage and great storage space. Welcome home!
Confidential Remarks: Offers welcome Monday, July 22, at 12pm. Please email them to mary@vantagesanfrancisco.com and use the SFAR contract. Escrow pre-opened with Janette Marcelo, Old Republic Title. On Supra. Floor plan shows 2080 SF. Tax records show 1750 SF. The rooms downstairs may have been built without benefit of permit. Buyer to verify to satisfaction.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Ideally located on a quiet cul-de-sac North of Lake Street, this traditional Edwardian home spans over 3 levels and features 3-bedrooms, 2.5-bathrooms, high ceilings, period details, beautiful woodworking and incredible light throughout. The main level is perfect for entertaining and families alike with a spacious living room, formal dining room and cozy family room with built-ins, a fireplace and bay windows overlooking the lovely rear garden. Upstairs consists of the primary bedroom with ensuite bathroom, 2 bedrooms, a sunroom (perfect for an office, playroom or possible 4th bedroom) and another full bathroom. The lowermost level has a 2-car garage, laundry room and access to the backyard. A truly enviable location close to Mountain Lake Park, the Presidio, the shops and restaurants on Clement and California Street as well as neighborhood favorites like Pizzetta 211, Pearl and Breadbelly.
Confidential Remarks: Offers, if any, are due on Thursday, Dec. 7th at noon. Please send offers to both marylou.castellanos@sothebys.realty and hollis.bathen@sothebys.realty

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: 1935 Cabrillo St. is a masterpiece of modern living and classic charm. This fully reimagined gem is your ticket to luxurious living in one of San Francisco's most desirable areas. This impressive home boasts 4 bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, providing unparalleled comfort and privacy. The open-concept main floor features a chef's kitchen with Thermador appliances and additional flex room that can be utilized as an office/den, family/play room, there is a full bath adjacent. Enjoy entertaining in the light-filled kitchen that opens up to the expansive backyard, complete with tiered garden. Discover additional living possibilities on the lower level, where you'll find a private in-law/nanny suite. Perfect for guests, extended family, or au pair. The lower level also offers generous 1-car parking with EV charging, storage stages as a wine cellar, and additional work storage. Please note, tax records do not indicate the number of bedrooms; remodeling permit for lower level lists 1st floor add family room, media room and bath. Buyer's agent should review disclosures to complete satisfaction of all questions.
Confidential Remarks: Please contact Christian or Sam for a private showing, no supra lockbox.Please note, tax records do not indicate the number of bedrooms; remodeling permit for lower level lists 1st floor add family room, media room and bath. Buyer's agent should review disclosures to complete satisfaction of all questions.

One block away from the Golden Gate Park, the de Young Museum, and close to the Presidio. 3 Bedrooms +Bonus Room / 3 Bathrooms. Landscaped Backyard. Garage Parking for 1 Car.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Perfectly situated on a serene cul-de-sac just north of Lake Street, this charming Edwardian residence spans three levels, offering a blend of traditional elegance and modern convenience. Boasting 5 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms, this home features soaring ceilings, exquisite period details, and abundant natural light throughout. The main level provides an ideal setting for both gatherings and daily living, featuring a spacious open kitchen/living area seamlessly connected to an inviting deck, formal dining room, versatile office space, and an elegant living room adorned with built-ins, a fireplace, and box-beamed ceilings. Upstairs, the primary bedroom retreat awaits with its ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet, accompanied by two additional bedrooms and another full bathroom. Ascend to the top floor to discover two more light-filled bedrooms offering picturesque views of the nearby Presidio. Completing this exceptional residence, the lowermost level offers convenient amenities including a two-car garage, laundry hookups, and direct access to the meticulously landscaped backyard oasis. A truly enviable location close to Mountain Lake Park, the Presidio, the shops and restaurants on Clement and California Street as well as neighborhood favorites like Pizzetta 211, Pearl and Breadbelly.
Confidential Remarks: Offers, if any, are due on Friday, March 15th by 4pm. Please submit offers via HomeLight Listing Management. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This modern top-floor 3 BD, 2 BA condo offers a large outdoor terrace that runs the full width of the home and features 3 well-sized bedrooms, including a primary suite with its own terrace access. Surrounded by windows on all sides and with elegant sloped ceilings, the living/dining area feels bright and open yet cozy, and features a staircase with a custom steel hand railing, a gas fireplace, and rich dark-toned hardwood floors. The kitchen includes a skylight, ample cabinetry; quartz countertops with a central island; a tile backsplash; stainless steel appliances (Viking fridge, Bosch dishwasher); and a Bertazzoni gas range & hood. The primary bedroom suite includes a walk-in closet and a skylight, plus a sunny spa-like en-suite bath w/ a large vanity, glass-enclosed shower, and deep soaking tub. A second full bathroom with a skylight is located in the hallway. Take advantage of miles of walking and biking trails, botanical gardens, and lakes, plus world-class art and science museums, all in close proximity. 216 17th Avenue puts the best of the Richmond District's great restaurants and fun bars and boutiques along Clement Street right at your doorstep. Deeded 1-car garage parking, deeded storage, and additional storage space available.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Like new dream home in the heart of the Richmond. Completely reimagined and renovated 4 bed, 4.5 bath residence, which exudes modern sophistication and luxury. Main level features open concept kitchen / living / dining, plus laundry room and powder room for your guests. Professionally-appointed chef's kitchen with all the bells and whistles: high-end appliance suite, pot filler, built-in cutting board & drying rack, under-cabinet lighting. Dining area seamlessly opens up to a sunny deck, overlooking the FABULOUS backyard. 3 bedroom suites on the upper level, including primary suite with luxurious steam shower and freestanding tub. Expansive lower level offers ultimate flexibility: 4th bedroom or use as a family/media room. Full Bathroom. Wet bar. Wine fridge. Additional wine storage - chic! Access to the most incredible outdoor space. Spacious covered patio leads up to turf area for putting practice and bocce ball, plumbed outdoor BBQ, climbing wall AND swing - wow!! High-end finishes and thoughtful touches throughout. Lovely contemporary facade. Attached garage. 3 blocks to Golden Gate Park. Moments to all the amenities of Geary Blvd, as well as Park Presidio and Fulton for easy commuting.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Immerse yourself in the refined elegance of this corner lot sanctuary, where luxury and functionality converge. At the heart of this single-family home is an open floor plan that seamlessly unites the kitchen and family room, creating an expansive and welcoming space for gathering, entertaining, and everyday living. Adjacent to this open area is a gracious formal dining room, adorned with period details and built-ins, and a generous formal living room with a fireplace, offering warmth and a refined ambiance. Ascend to the upper quarters to discover four bedrooms, including a primary suite with dual walk-in closets and a spa-like soaking tub. The lower level boasts a one-bedroom, one-bath suite and a beautifully appointed bathroom, perfect for guests, multi-generational living, or an au pair. This level also includes a thoughtfully designed laundry room and one-car garage parking. Adjacent to the main house, the charming cottage serves as an ideal home office space, complete with a full bathroom and kitchen, adding versatility to the property's layout. A sunny backyard offers a serene outdoor space, perfect for relaxation and enjoyment.Located in a walker's paradise, with the Presidio and Golden Gate Park just blocks away, and steps from bustling Clement.
Confidential Remarks: Amazing family compound opportunity, perfect for multi-generational living. Pre-sale escrow opened with First American Title Company, E.O. Liz Paglinawan. DP linked via Disclosures I/O. Technically, a 2-unit residential building with a detached commercial space. It functions like a 3-level single-family residence (5 bedrooms/3.5 baths) with a detached cottage (perfect for home office or au pair suite - it has a full kitchen and bathroom). The seller utilized the property as a single family home. The 3R report states that 295-299 14th Avenue is classified as a one-family dwelling. The last loan on the property was a Wells Fargo residential owner user loan. Susan Costello at Wells Fargo is familiar with the property (her number is 415-755-3465). Call agents with any questions!

Public Remarks: Welcome to this charming top-floor 3 bed 1.5 bath condo in the highly sought-after Lake District. Step inside to the sunny and spacious living room, which seamlessly flows into the formal dining room, providing ample space for entertaining. Walk out onto the private deck, and enjoy the colorful and fruitful shared backyard, perfect for hosting outdoor gatherings. This condo boasts a beautifully remodeled kitchen, updated bathrooms, elegant period details, graceful archways, coved ceilings, dual pane windows, and gorgeous hardwood floors. Additional features include an in-unit washer & dryer, a permitted 1/2 bath added in 2021, a deeded parking spot, and ample storage in the garage. You can walk to several local restaurants, cafes, specialty grocers, parks, and playgrounds! Don't miss this incredible opportunity to own a piece of Edwardian charm combined with modern amenities in one of the highly desirable locations in the city.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to 135 15th Avenue, where classic charm meets modern flair in this spectacularly remodeled home. Bright rooms and a lush backyard with verdant views await you in this 5-bed, 3.5-bath gem in Lake District, embodying the essence of California living. Step into the foyer and be greeted by a radiant formal living room with a cozy wood-burning fireplace, ideal for unwinding. The flow leads to the dining room, adorned with wainscoting and box-beam ceilings for memorable meals. The heart of the home awaits: a chef's kitchen and inviting great room featuring an island, breakfast bar, and gas fireplace. Equipped with a Wolf 6-burner range, two Bosch dishwashers, Thermador refrigerator, and pantry, this kitchen is a culinary paradise. Upstairs, four bedrooms including an expansive primary suite with a luxurious bath, walk-in closet, and private deck offer a serene escape. Downstairs, the lower level boasts the 5th bedroom, a family room with wet bar, and seamless indoor/outdoor living leading to the garden. Additional features include a laundry room, 2-car garage with storage, and more. Just a block from the Presidio, 135 15th Avenue is your playful retreat in San Francisco, where classic elegance meets modern convenience.

Remarks: Ideally perched high above the street on a quiet block in the Lake District, this 2-unit 3-story Victorian residence offers a fantastic 3-bed 1.5 bath home on the top 2 levels and a fully outfitted junior 1-bed 1-bath garden apartment on the ground floor, with over 2,350 sf +/- of combined living space. Featuring 10-foot-high ceilings on the main floor, the primary residence exudes old world elegance & sophistication, and includes formal dining and living rooms w/ bay windows & wood-burning fireplace; a spacious eat-in kitchen w/ butcher block center island, adjacent a redwood deck overlooking a sweet garden w/ a mature Monterey Pine tree. With 1 bed downstairs and 2 up, the primary bed has abundant natural light & views, and there is ample storage throughout. At the ground level a 700 sf +/- junior 1-bed unit offers a myriad of possibilities for extra income or guests & includes an entry/living room, eat-in kitchen, full bath, and bed nook w/ garden views. In addition, a bonus workshop space w/ built in desk is accessed via a separate side entrance. The property's location on the border of Richmond & Lake Street Districts offers easy access to vibrant restaurants, public transport

Up to you, but this home is not exactly a fixer. This classic home offers the quintessential traditional architecture with intact period details and charm.
